tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear All,
We have visited Arya Women's Health Hospital for my wife's pregnancy and we have a great experience with the hospital. Entire staff of the hospital is very good. Doctor treated patient very nicely. ****** ****** * ***** ********* ** ***** ****** They always speak politely with their patient. They always inform about the medicines. ***** ********* *** **** ****** ********** They are having a weekly lecture for pregnant women. In that lecture they speak on different topics on pregnancy and they also inform about the different exercises for pregnant women. They are having every equipment with them so you no need to go here and there for test and all. Also like to share that after a birth of my second child they celebrate my daughter's birthday which comes a day after my second child. So, doctor and entire staff is very friendly with their patient and their family too.
Thank you for your support and treatment given to my wife. We are very happy after visiting the clinic.
We are wishing you all the best wishes from our end and all the best for the work.
Thank you once again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Vidya Patil was our hero throughout our pregnancy and we thank her from the bottom of our hearts.
Our relationship with her transitioned naturally from that of a patient and doctor (as normally expected) to that of a parent-to-be and mentor. Dr. Vidya kept us informed of our progress all through. With her by our side, we like to think that ours was indeed a normal (caesarean) delivery!
She also served as rock-solid support for us, with her crystal clear inputs and logical advice. Our support system on Arya Womens Hospital  was completed by several other special people, including the wonderful nurses; in particular, Sisters Aarti,Jansi, and Pooja.
Overall, Arya Womens Hospital was a fantastic experience. The fact that all the medical facilities were housed under one roof, right from the pharmacy to the pathology lab, made every consultation smooth. Memorable gestures that will forever be etched in our hearts and minds will be the way she arranged a beautiful decorated cake for us the day after our baby’s birth.
Thank you, Dr.Vidya for running this chain so professionally, yet so personally.Priyanka Verma!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Pregnancy is special and very anxious time of life for patient and her family, Dr. Vidya Patil and her team at Arya Woman's hospital were extremely helpful and had a smooth and very satisfying experience with her in consultations as well as in decision making..Timely decisions and very practical approach to all critical situations with wonderful communication skills makes the doctor stand out..

Thanks Dr. Patil for making my pregnancy memorable experience and for a beutiful bundle of joy to me and my family..God bless all your patients like I was , and regards to your entire team..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The experience was quite good. But not satisfactory!! There was no time value. Had to wait for 30mins! The staff was rude and slow.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I delivered a baby boy 9 months ago. In my pregnancy many problems arose during 6 month, but dr.vidya patil was too calm and made me too. My baby had 2 loops of umbilical cord around his neck. Maybe other doctors would have recommended me c section, but dr. Vidya Patil made me comfortable and asked what I wanted. As commonly everyone wants I wanted it to be normal delivery. So Doctor took that risk and help me deliver my baby boy Normally instead of all the risks. I am thankful to Dr. Vidya Patil, due to her my pregnancy and delivery both were a ease❤️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a wonderful bonding with Dr. Vidya Patil.  My first delivery was done at Arya Women's Hospital Kandivali west.  She always made me relaxed and feel special.  She is wonderful and amazing doctor and a person too. . For all my gynaec issues even after 9 years of my delivery I still trust her.  The hospital is well equipped with high end instruments and a very well trained staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had histerectomy done because of fibroids. Experience was very good. Doctor is very friendly and explained all the details well. Staff members are very good and helpful. Surgery went well, even if it was bit serious. Post operative care was good. I will say the doctor is excellent.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Vidya Patil is very much experienced and friendly. She is best counsellor in medical problem. Hospital is well equipped and organized. Nursing staff, assistant staff all are very caring and loving. I am lucky that I got such Dr. 
Thank you very much !
I am very grateful to you. 
May God bless all in your noble profession.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr.vidya Patil is a very experienced and proffessional gynaecologist.Her entire staff is well trained and provides prompt services.they really have a very caring approach towards the patient.
I would just say it's an entire organised team effort at Arya.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Prenatal & postnatal healthcare was provided by Dr. Patil. She made the whole process stress free. I was glad to attend all the sessions planned for diet consultation,  yoga, delivery related brief which explained scenarios when C section is needed and capabilities to help deliver normally. I was in labour for many hours but Dr and her team were caring, patient unlike some who push you to have a C section because of their unavailbility. I delivered a healthy baby. The paed associated with the dr is great too and I still refer to her. This time I visited for a follow up on the cervical cancer preventive vaccination which was taken care of by the staff. Dr Patil and her staff are excellent at what they do and I highly recommend them

tags: None
review:
Going through childbirth is a mix of immense pain followed by immense happiness. In this journey, the presence of a wonderful doctor in Mrs. Vidya Patil is simply priceless. Thanks doctor, for comforting us and taking away our stress.

　

We were lucky to have a doctor & wonderful human being in Mrs. Vidya Patil who made our parenthood dreams come true & also would like to thank the entire family of Arya hospital for the care taken during our hospitalization

Uma

tags: None
review: Dr.Vidya patil is extermly kind and courteous doctor.I have been coming to her since 2009 and my baby is delivered here in Arya hosp cital and since then I have not been to any other doctor . She is so good and explain the treatment very patiently  that even for the smallest problem I come to her or call her.She is never in hurry to wind up and gives proper time. In short she is the best doctor and above all a very kindhearted person.I never feel am visiting doctor but a friend.

review:
I had a complicated delivery with multiple issues like low lying placenta, pregnancy induced hypertension etc but Dr Patil helped us sail through all the problems throughout and we welcomed a healthy baby girl last week itself.
I would highly recommend Dr Patil and thank her for all the guidance.

tags: Wait time,
review: On Practo doctor's consultation hours are indicated to be fr 6.30 pm to 8.30 pm. When called for availability at around 8.15 pm, the response from Arya hospital's reception was that doctor will be available till 8 pm only. If the doctor can't make herself during the specified consultation hours, it reflects lack of commitment to patients.

tags: None
review:
The doctor asked my wife to take lot of unwanted tests.
They have most of the testing equipment in house.
The doctor might be good, but my wife was not cured by her and so we had to search for another doctor.

tags: None
review:
For a minor Infection, she gave me so many medicines. The next day I got a severe stomach ache due to the same post which she added Anti Biotics and asked me to visit again. On visiting again, she asked for Sonography. From the very next day I was Vomiting for 3 days. Diarrhea from the medicines. 

This all was not really required  I believe. Sonography was pure wastage of My money. Not at all happy.
reply_text:
Dear Renu,

I presume that their was a pelvic inflamatory disease with you, for which proper antibiotic course is requirerd. If a proper bland diet which was adviced is not followed can cause gastritis which is common and happened to you, since medicines work differently on each individual.

Unfortunately, you did not Followed Up and reverted back for the same even when we asked you to follow up. 

Pelvic Infection can also cause abseces hydrasalphinx and adhesions in the pelvic which are diagnosed on sonography. This was required to rule out other conditions apart from PID causing pain abdomen.
Antibiotic induced dirrahorea can happen, for  which you should have shared for follow up.
 
I feel sad with the type of feedback you have given without following up with  me and I feel you have been instigated unfortunately.

-Dr. Vidya

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor is excellent. Good communicates and explain in details. Presence of mind. Caring and suportive. And staff also very coordinating.
Thanks to all of you.
